login.step3FooterTitle: You do not have an account?
login.step4Description: Get a verification code from the authenticator app
login.step4VerificationError: Your code doesn't match. Please, try again!

restore.step1Description: The phone number you last logged in with.
restore.step2Description: The passcode or phone number you entered is incorrect
restore.step2VerificationDescription: We just need to perform a coupe of security checks to recover your account.

restore.step3Description: Get a verification code from the authenticator app
restore.step4Description: To keep your account safe, we need to make sure it’s you!

signup.step3SendNews: Keep me up to date with Liber news and offers

configureApp.faceIdTitle: Log in with a Face ID
configureApp.faceIdDescription: Use Face ID instead of a passcode to log in. It is more secure.
configureApp.pushNotificationsDescription: Get notified about spending, security, wealth, market movements, discounts and deals, so you’re always in the know
configureApp.touchIdTitle: Log in with a Touch ID
configureApp.touchIdDescription: Use Touch ID instead of a passcode to log in. It is more secure.
configureApp.scanQRMessage: Scan QR code with the authenticator app or enter the code manually.
configureApp.backupCodeMessage: Store this backup code somewhere safe – print it, write it down.
configureApp.verifyIdentityMessage: If you ever lose access to your device, you can use this code to verify you identity.
configureApp.invalidCodeMessage: Your code doesn't match. Please, try again!
configureApp.installAppDescription: Install an authenticator app on your mobile device. Recommended options:
configureApp.createPassCode: Enhance the security of your account by creating a passcode
configureApp.invalidPassCode: Your passcode doesn't match. Please, try again!
configureApp.twoFADescription: Take these few steps to enable two-factor authentication and make your account more secure.
